version_description:
Thank you for using the Bose Connect app. At Bose, we always strive to be better. We believe these changes will enhance your SoundLink around-ear wire headphones II experience.

We improved the look and feel of the app,
added a Volume control,
added Product Details within Settings,
and added an easy way to provide Feedback to Bose.
Addressed minor app issues from customer feedback.

Thanks for using Bose® Connect! We have some new updates, and think they’ll improve your wireless experience:
- Updated to include compatibility with our new QuietComfort® 35 wireless headphones and SoundSport® wireless headphones! - Bug fixes.
Tell us what you think of Bose Connect by leaving your feedback. We’re always working to be better in everything we do.
- Minor Bug fixes

Thanks for using Bose Connect! We have some new updates, and we think they’ll improve your wireless experience:

- Updated for compatibility with our new QuietControl™ 30 wireless headphones! Be the master of your environment by deciding how much of the outside world to let in. Control the levels of noise cancelling from the Connect app.

- Updated for compatibility with our new SoundSport® Pulse wireless headphones! Track your heartbeat directly from your ear with a built-in heart rate monitor. The Connect app displays accurate readings in real time, so tracking your performance is easy.

- We changed the layout a bit to make it easier to get around.

- Bug fixes and improvements.

Tell us what you think of Bose Connect by leaving your feedback. We’re always working to be better in everything we do.
- Bug fixes and improvements

- Introducing Music Share! After a quick over-the-air update for your headphones, you can stream music or audio with a friend between two Bose headphones at the same time.

- Bug fixes and improvements

Thanks for using Bose Connect! We have some updates that will make listening to music even better.

- Updated for compatibility with our new SoundLink® Revolve and SoundLink® Revolve+ Bluetooth® speakers! These small speakers are packed with technology to deliver 360 degree sound that makes you feel like you’re immersed in the song.

- Introducing Party Mode! Connect two SoundLink® Revolve/Revolve+ speakers together to play music with double the volume. ’Cuz when you throw a party, you need to bump.

- Introducing Stereo Mode! Get even closer to the feeling of a live performance when you connect two speakers together.

- The usual bug fixes and improvements.

And leave us feedback! We want to know what’s working and what isn’t, so we can keep making it better.
This release includes a data collection opt-out.  If selected, Bose will not receive usage information from the App.

Bose Connect 4.2 contains the following new features:
⁃ Our privacy policy has been updated to include even more information
⁃ Introducing noise reduction settings for QuietComfort 35 wireless headphones (requires firmware update to headphones)
⁃ We’ve also fixed some bugs to make Bose Connect even better

What's new in Bose Connect 5.2:
• We've updated our Privacy Policy and Terms of Use
• Bug fixes and enhancements

What's new in Bose Connect 5.0:
- Updated for compatibility with our new QuietComfort®, SoundSport®, SoundLink®, and SoundWear® products.
- Find My Buds – a new feature for SoundSport® Free Wireless Headphones – a simple tool to help you find lost earbuds
- Introducing Party Mode for SoundLink® Color Bluetooth Speaker II* (requires firmware update for speaker)
- Fresh new icon
- Bug fixes and enhancements

What's new in Bose Connect 5.1:
•Bug fixes and enhancements

What's new in Bose Connect 5.2:
• We've updated our Privacy Policy and Terms of Use
• Bug fixes and enhancements

• Music & Favorites with Apple Music and TuneIn
• At launch, only app customers on iOS iPhones who have iOS language settings set to US-English will be able to see the feature set
• Support for our new aviation headset, ProFlight
• Bug fixes and enhancements

• Support for our new all-in-one PA, S1 Pro
• Bug fixes and enhancements

• Support for our new all-in-one PA, S1 Pro
• Bug fixes and enhancements
• Bug fixes and enhancements

• Introducing the Amazon Alexa Voice Assistant for QuietComfort® 35 II (requires firmware update for headphones)
• Bug fixes and enhancements

What’s new in Bose Connect 6.3:
• Bug fixes and enhancements

Thanks for using the Bose Connect app! We update the app regularly so that you can get the most from your Bose products.
Here’s what we did for Bose Connect version 9.0:  
- Made improvements to the Product Update process
- Made Accessibility improvements
- Fixed bugs, improved the UI, and did some general cleaning up under the hood

Thanks for using the Bose Connect app! We update the app regularly so that you can get the most from your Bose products.
Here’s what we did for Bose Connect version 9.0.1:
- Made improvements to the Product Update process
- Made Accessibility improvements
- Fixed bugs, improved the UI, and did some general cleaning up under the hood
- A problem where the app would crash on the Music tab has been resolved

Thanks for using the Bose Connect app! We update the app regularly so that you can get the most from your Bose products.

Here’s what we did for Bose Connect version 8.1.1:
- Made Accessibility improvements
- Fixed bugs, improved the UI, and did some general cleaning up under the hood

What's new in Bose Connect 7.0.1:
• Bug fixes and other enhancements
• Fixed connection issues for S1 Pro

Thanks for using the Bose Connect app! We update the app regularly so that you can get the most from your Bose products.

Here’s what we did for Bose Connect version 8.0:
- Laid the groundwork to support Bose AR – an innovative audio-only take on augmented reality (coming soon!)
- Made Accessibility improvements
- Fixed bugs, improved the UI, and did some general cleaning up under the hood

What’s new in Bose Connect 6.3.1:
• Bug fixes and enhancements

What’s new in Bose Connect 6.3.1:
• Bug fixes and enhancements

What's new in Bose Connect 7.0:
•Support for Bose Frames
•Bug fixes and other enhancements
